channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- BIG-IP LTM, Advanced WAF, ASM, and APM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- BIG-IP LTM, Advanced WAF, ASM, and APM

item.title: CVE-2022-29491|2024-08-03T06:26:05.975Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20ltm%2C%20advanced%20waf%2C%20asm%2C%20and%20apm
item.description: On F5 BIG-IP LTM, Advanced WAF, ASM, or APM 16.1.x versions prior to 16.1.2.2, 15.1.x versions prior to 15.1.5, 14.1.x versions prior to 14.1.4.6, and all versions of 13.1.x, 12.1.x, and 11.6.x, when a virtual server is configured with HTTP, TCP on one side (client/server), and DTLS on the other (server/client), undisclosed requests can cause the TMM process to terminate. Note: Software versions which have reached End of Technical Support (EoTS) are not evaluated
